name: Contact Form Plugin by Likeable Forms | Form Builder Software for People.
author: Likeable Forms

sections.description:
Build dependable, scalable, stunningly designed contact forms. With Likeable Forms you can easily create advanced contact forms with easy-to-use features like drag and drop, build dynamic forms with advanced features like conditional logic and field mapping, create rich dynamic outgoing email notifications with full HTML support, preview form submissions from within the plugin, and power up with marketplace extensions.

Beginner Friendly Drag and Drop Functionality

Our sleek dark-mode enabled drag and drop form builder comes packed with advanced developer like features out-of-the-box. Simply drag or click a field to start building new forms! Effortlessly add, duplicate, delete, and sort fields. Designed to be the most intuitive drag and drop form builder plugin with advanced highlighted color changing drop zone indicators.

Responsive and Cross Browser Compatible

Create professional and responsive contact forms. Our “part of the web” inspired design framework includes pixel-perfect designs. Fully compatible with all major browsers, devices, and virtually all brands. Automatically create stunning out-of-the-box designed contact forms without writing a single line of CSS.

Build Dynamic Form Notifications with Field Mapping

Create outgoing email notifications with a dedicated notifications tab that feels just like an inbox. Map dynamic form data, add custom HTML to create beautiful emails, include file uploads as attachments to one or multiple team members or recipients. Select a company email to look even more professional. Ensure email deliverability by using one of our SMTP extensions such as the Amazon Web Server (AWS) SMTP extension.

Form Security & Validation

Complex validation, sanitization and prepared statements are pre-implemented to help protect against spammers and malicious attackers. More secure than client-side validation is server side validation. Likeable Forms does both. Our server-side form validation provides instant feedback to the user if form validation fails. Likeable Forms adheres to all of the latest WordPress Coding Standards and plugin security recommendations.

Build Advanced & Custom Forms with Conditional Logic

Show or hide fields with conditional logic. Use other fields, math, static, and/or dynamic form values as your conditions to alter the form fields that appear in your form. Add as little or as many rules as you need!

Marketplace Extensions

Here are just a few marketplace extensions you can download to build custom payment forms, newsletter subscriber forms, PDF & legally-binding signature forms, add new tickets to your companies favorite CRM, collaborate with team members, send programmable SMS notifications to customers, and/or ensure email deliverability.

See one of our extensions in action!

Form Extensions By Category

Payments | PDF & E-Sign | CRM | Email Marketing | SMTP | SMS/MMS

Payments
Start accepting secure online payments for one-time purchases or recurring subscriptions.

  • Stripe
  • PayPal Braintree
  • Square

PDF & E-Sign
Automatically generate PDFs with dynamically added signers and start collecting legally-binding signatures

  • Dropbox Sign
  • PandaDoc
  • BoldSign

CRM
Automatically add new tickets to your team’s favorite CRM inbox.

  • Help Scout
  • Freshworks
  • HubSpot
  • Zendesk
  • Teamwork
  • Intercom
  • Zoho
  • Liveagent
  • Enchant

Email Marketing
Automatically begin your email marketing campaigns by enrolling new subscribers into your email newsletter list.

  • Active Campaign
  • Campaign Monitor
  • Email Octopus
  • GetResponse
  • Mailchimp
  • Mailjet
  • Mailmodo
  • Omnisend
  • SendGrid
  • Sendinblue

SMTP
Increase email deliverability rates by integrating an SMTP Server

  • Amazon (AWS)
  • Elastic Email
  • MailerSend
  • Mailgun
  • Mailjet
  • Mailtrap
  • Postmark
  • SendGrid
  • Sendinblue
  • Zoho/Zeptomail

SMS/MMS
Send customizable SMS & MMS messages to recipients programmatically.

  • Twilio

Join the community!

The Likeable Forms Forum is a place for people to get help, make suggestions, and communicate with the community. If you need help you can always mention any individual team member or the official @LikeableForms Just type @ to see a full list of community members.

Branding Guidelines
To download logos, colors and to learn more about use, see media kit.

Marketplace
To purchase and/or download marketplace extensions see pricing.

Additional Info

Likeable Forms relies on 3rd party services. The full list of 3rd party services are listed below:

  1. https://forum.likeableforms.com

The 3rd party services listed above are used to allow users of Likeable Forms to post and answer questions on the Likeable Forms online community without leaving their WordPress website via an Iframe.

For more information see:
2. https://forum.likeableforms.com/privacy (Privacy.)
3. https://forum.likeableforms.com/tos (Terms.)
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress admin, choose plugins > add new.
  2. At the top of the add new plugins page, click upload plugin > then choose file.
  3. Select the plugin zip and click open.
  4. Select Install Now.
  5. Select Activate Plugin.
sections.faq:
Is Likeable Forms free?

Likeable Forms CORE is free to download.

Where can I get additional support?

Please create a new topic on our WordPress Support Forum or you can post a new topic on the Likeable Forms Support Forum.

What do I need to do to start with Likeable Forms today?

Please download and install the Likeable Forms Core plugin to get started.

Will I have access to updates?

Yes, we release updates regularly.

Are marketplace extensions included?

Marketplace extensions require an active subscription. See marketplace pricing to learn more.
